meanings.definition: Bent or curved forward or upward.
meanings.sent1: The antrorse branches of the tree reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent2: The antrorse petals of the flower faced the morning sun.
meanings.sent3: The antrorse squirrel tried to climb the tree upside down for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her antrorse ambition led her to new heights of success.
meanings.sent5: The antrorse mountain path twisted and turned towards the summit.

meanings.definition: Growing or pointing upward or forward.
meanings.sent1: The antrorse vines climbed the garden wall with determination.
meanings.sent2: The antrorse arrow flew straight towards the target.
meanings.sent3: The antrorse sunflowers seemed to be waving at the sky.
meanings.sent4: His antrorse dreams soared high above the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The antrorse road sign pointed travelers in the right direction.
